headline.main: Tunnel Vision; Subway Tunnel Workers At Front Lines of New War

lead_paragraph: It has always been strange, walking back and forth across the bottom of the East River in the middle of the night. ''Sometimes,'' Frank Ortiz says, ''you can hear the tugboats, going by above you.''
snippet: It has always been strange, walking back and forth across the bottom of the East River in the middle of the night.    ''Sometimes,'' Frank Ortiz says, ''you can hear the tugboats, going by above you.''...
